typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_lsn} as integer,
		{_metadata} as ({} as string),
		compkey as integer,
		currentTime as string,
		day as string,
		hour as integer,
		humidity as double,
		lux as double,
		month as string,
		objectTemperature as double,
		pressure as double,
		sensorTag as string,
		temperatureFromHumidity as double,
		temperatureFromIr as double,
		year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		compkey
	)) ~> iotdata
iotdata select(mapColumn(
		sensorTag,
		humidity,
		temperatureFromHumidity,
		objectTemperature,
		temperatureFromIr,
		pressure,
		lux,
		currentTime,
		year,
		month,
		day,
		hour,
		compkey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Projection
Projection sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> LoadtoDatalake
